Description: Textile fragment of linen cloth of medium quality; comparatively compact; undyed but now a dark cream colour; no original edges. Worn. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.24 ends per 10mm and weft c.8 picks per 10mm. Edges are torn or ragged.
